room_title: Escape room "Kevin, the Clean - Shaven Pirate" by Unlocked! Escape Rooms in Andover
room_description: As first mate, you were furious Captain Kevin didn't trust you with the treasure map he claimed to have. So you gathered a few other officers loyal to yourself, and marooned the Captain! The crew is willing to follow your command . . . if you can find the treasure map in the Captain's Quarters! If not, you will face the same fate as your former commander!
